p: LB technique can be used to mimic natural biomembrane artificially [ 59, 65, 66, 73, 74]. Accordingly LB system has been used in biological research in a variety of ways [ 58, 67, 69, 75, 76]. LB films of certain materials have been used to immobilize an enzyme or a protein, which can trap and bind with some ions or molecules that change some measureable property of the film [ 59, 65, 67]. Accordingly the properties of those enzymes and proteins can be studied [ 77, 78, 79]. Recently LB technique has been used to investigate the lipid layers containing artificial tears [80]. Lipid-containing artificial tears are used to restore the lipid layer in thin films.
